attributes.description:
MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.
Advertised pricing excludes customary on the road fees of R 8 390, optional mechanical warranty and other value added products.  
Errors and omissions excepted, terms and conditions apply.

attributes.description:
Every inch of the Volkswagen Polo TSI has been crafted to give you a bolder, sportier and more inspiring driving experience. 

To book a test drive contact Philwest Volkswagen Mastercars located in Strand, Helderberg today!
attributes.title: 2019 Volkswagen Polo 1.0 TSI Comfortline Auto

attributes.description:
The VW T-Cross. 
With its raised seat position, the interior of the T-Cross creates a wonderful feeling of freedom and offers variable adjustment options. It provides plenty of space for passengers, luggage and spontaneous plans. The sliding and folding rear seat bench creates even more luggage space if necessary and expands the luggage compartment from a volume of up to 455 litres to up to 1,281 litres when it is folded down. 

The overall package is rounded off by lots of practical storage compartments and pockets, a cup holder and a mobile phone compartment in the centre console. Discover how this Volkswagen can drive you beyond your comfort zone without ever compromising on elegance. 

To book a test drive contact Philwest Volkswagen located in Helderberg today.
attributes.title: 2022 Volkswagen T-Cross 1.0 TSI Highline Auto
